articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Despite huge losses, US airlines are rolling in cash
articles.description: The US airline industry just closed the books on the worst year in its history, losing a combined $32 billion excluding special items. Yet it still ended 2020 awash in an ocean of cash.

articles.author: Nic Robertson, Sarah Dean and Sarah Sirgany, CNN
articles.title: Death sentence of Saudi man jailed as a teen for anti-government protests is commuted
articles.description: A man who was arrested and sentenced to death for taking part in anti-government protests as a teen in Saudi Arabia has had his sentence commuted, his father told CNN Sunday.

articles.title: Biden says he won't lift sanctions on Iran to bring country back to negotiating table
articles.description: President Joe Biden said the US will not lift sanctions to get Iran back to the negotiating table, suggesting the measure would only happen if Tehran stops enriching uranium.
articles.content:

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Chuck Johnston, CNN
articles.title: Frank Shankwitz, Make-a-Wish Foundation co-founder, dies at 77
articles.description: Frank Shankwitz, a longtime Arizona Department of Public Safety officer who co-founded the Make-A-Wish Foundation, has died, his wife told the New York Times.

articles.title: Dominion spokesman: Mike Lindell is begging to be sued
articles.description: Dominion spokesman Michael Steel weighs in on the possibility of additional legal action being taken by the company against MyPillow CEO Mike Lindell and Fox News.

articles.author: Anna Sturla and Laura Ly, CNN
articles.title: NYPD disciplines officer who wore a pro-Trump patch on her uniform
articles.description: An NYPD officer seen on social media wearing a pro-Trump patch while in uniform has received "an initial discipline," New York Police Department spokeswoman Detective Sophia Mason said.

articles.author: Christine Romans, CNN Business
articles.title: Every aspect of Americans' working lives has changed -- for the worse
articles.description: Dig beneath the topline numbers in the government's monthly jobs report and you can see just how unprecedented the pandemic-fueled jobs crisis really is. Every aspect of Americans' working lives has changed -- for the worse.

articles.title: One of Apple's more controversial tech features may be going away this year. Many won't miss it
articles.description: Apple may be doing away with one of its most divisive pieces of technology this year, and some fans aren't sorry to see it go.

articles.title: Jake Tapper issues warning to GOP about Capitol riot
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper says there's been no real accountability for several prominent GOP leaders after the Capitol riot.

articles.title: Hear Rep. Ayanna Pressley's impassioned impeachment message
articles.description: Rep. Ayanna Pressley (D-MA) called strongly for the Senate to convict former President Donald Trump after he was impeached by the House following the Capitol siege and told CNN's Jake Tapper that these riots where symbolic of the state of America.

articles.author: Hande Atay Alam, CNN Business
articles.title: A new children's book about Wuhan's coronavirus whistleblower teaches bravery
articles.description: A new children's book called "Doctor Li and The Crown-Wearing Virus" is the origin story of Doctor Li Wenliang, who first raised the alarm that a novel coronavirus was spreading in Wuhan, China.

articles.author: Jill Martin, CNN
articles.title: Tom Brady vs. Patrick Mahomes is a Super Bowl matchup that spans the ages
articles.description: A lot of numbers get thrown around during Super Bowl week. This year, it includes this: 18 years, 45 days -- the age difference between Tom Brady and Patrick Mahomes.
